# Wiki Links with .md and Anchors

Tests that wiki links with both `.md` extension AND anchor work correctly.

## Links with .md and anchor

- [[target.md#section-one|Section One]]
- [[folder/nested.md#details|Nested Details]]

## Links with just anchor (no .md)

- [[target#section-two|Section Two]]

## Links with just .md (no anchor)

- [[target.md|Full Target]]
